Thank you for contacting YETI!
We are sorry to hear about the recent issue with your Rambler. To begin your warranty request we do require a few images to confirm and verify the size and issue you are experiencing.
• Full length picture of the Rambler with the YETI embossed logo facing forward.
• Picture(s) of the issue that you are experiencing with your Rambler.
Please reply back to this email with these images. Once we have received these pictures, we will be able to identify the issues you are having and further assist you.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters YETI 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
